KasturiVoucher","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Manages token claims, credentials, and vouchers  Architecture: - EXP is tracked OFF-CHAIN (web2 database) for gas efficiency - Users claim Kasturi Tokens ON-CHAIN by converting off-chain EXP - Kasturi Tokens can be used to purchase Voucher NFTs - SBT credentials are issued for program completion","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. returns.credentialTokenId: Token ID of credential (0 if none)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.rate: New rate (tokens per 1 EXP, with 18 decimals)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimTokensForUser(address,uint256).notice: Claim tokens for a user (called by backend after verifying off-chain EXP)

getUserStatus(address,bytes32).notice: Get user's token balance and credential status

issueCredentialForUser(address,bytes32).notice: Issue credential to user (called by backend after verifying program completion)

setExpToTokenRate(uint256).notice: Set EXP to Token conversion rate

verifyCompletion(address,bytes32).notice: Verify if a user has completed a program (public verification)
